Download TIGER shapes for lower state legislative districts

Source: R/state_leg_lower.R
tt_state_leg_lower.Rd

Download TIGER shapes for lower state legislative districts

Usage

tt_state_leg_lower(state, year = 2021)

Arguments

state

FIPs, postal codes, or full name of states.

year

Integer year. Required. Years < 2012 are not currently supported.

Value

sf data.frame

Examples

tt_state_leg_lower('DE')
#> Simple feature collection with 41 features and 12 fields
